                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.
                  <p>
                   <a class="btn btn-outline btn-outline-primary font-weight-semibold text-uppercase text-sm custom-btn-style-1" href="/about-we-team">
                    Read More
                   </a>
                  </p>
                 </div>

                 <div class="tab-content">

                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MATERIALS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. This is dedicated to the study of materials.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1433487371986-0-9">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MANUFACTURING
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The second semester for the edition 2023-2025 takes place in Université Haute-Alsace, France. It is dedicated to the study of manufacturing processes.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300053686-2-7">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       APPLICATIONS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. The studies of this semester are dedicated to applications.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300079974-3-5">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       THESIS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The fourth semester is dedicated to the preparation and presentation of the thesis. The place where it may take place is decided upon choice, at a full partner or associate partner.
                     </p>

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>

   <div class="column1 boxed" id="main">
    <!-- main -->
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-86 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          About WE-TEAM
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2023-11-09T00:31:48+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-graduation-cap text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    <strong>
                     Best AUTEX professors
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    Bringing together the best students, offering them the best AUTEX professors in each field and giving them a multiple international experience adds to their education and personal development.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-lightbulb text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    <strong>
                     Global thinking
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    At the hosting universities students meet the international professors, local students and local staff. They learn about the expertise and facilities of the host institution as well as regional industry and culture.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-user-friends text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    <strong>
                     Student groups
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    The student groups are also diverse in terms of nationality and background. Local students and industry engineers may attend single courses.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-industry text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    <strong>
                     Industry
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                    Industry is actively involved. They offer internships, real life cases, subjects for theses, educational materials and company visits. They support study visits and participation at international fairs.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row p-t-xxl row-align-items-center section section-default mt-0 mb-0 section-no-borders porto-inner-container" data-vc-full-width="true" data-vc-full-width-init="false">
            <div class="porto-wrap-container container">
             <div class="row">
              <div class="pr-lg-5 mb-sm-5 mb-lg-0 vc_column_container col-md-12 col-lg-6">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/academic-requirements/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best
                   <a href="https://www.autex.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                    AUTEX
                   </a>
                   professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="col-sm-8 offset-sm-5 mt-sm-5 pt-sm-5 vc_column_container col-md-6 offset-lg-2 col-lg-4 offset-md-4">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left vc_custom_1606676741303 position-absolute d-none d-sm-block" data-appear-animation="zoomIn" data-appear-animation-delay="300">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="" class="vc_single_image-img attachment-full" decoding="async" height="148" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/molecules-3713741_640_Image-by-zeeshan-ahmad-from-Pixabay_164_148.jpg" title="molecules-3713741_640_Image by zeeshan ahmad from Pixabay_164_148" width="164"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left vc_custom_1606676732739 position-absolute d-none d-sm-block" data-appear-animation="zoomIn" data-appear-animation-delay="100">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="" class="vc_single_image-img attachment-full" decoding="async" height="186" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/geometry-1044090_640_Image-by-Gerd-Altmann-from-Pixabay_212_186.jpg" title="geometry-1044090_640_Image by Gerd Altmann from Pixabay_212_186" width="212"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left position-relative mb-0" data-appear-animation="zoomIn" data-appear-animation-delay="600">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="" class="vc_single_image-img attachment-full" decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" height="288" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/ricardo-gomez-angel-Dd10IxdyUko-unsplash_318_288.jpg" title="ricardo-gomez-angel-Dd10IxdyUko-unsplash_318_288" width="318"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row-full-width vc_clearfix">
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row vc_custom_1606680935477">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 Building your career skills with WE-TEAM
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 WE-TEAM has initially started almost 20 years ago under the name of E-TEAM. The programme is still unique in its concept. It offers students an exceptional level of
                 <strong>
                  mobility
                 </strong>
                 and
                 <strong>
                  high quality education
                 </strong>
                 :
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Each of the 3 semesters are organised in a different location, the 4th semester students can carry out their master thesis at one of the
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org/members" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX members
                  </a>
                  , depending on their personal interest.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Each course is taught full time during one week.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The lecturers are recruited from the pool of more than 200 qualified
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX
                  </a>
                  professors.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  No single university can offer the same level of expertise in all areas of textiles, nor the same international experience.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The degrees awarded within the WE-TEAM programme have the required accreditations according to the European standards.
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row vc_custom_1645772500645 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving porto-inner-container" data-vc-full-width="true" data-vc-full-width-init="false" data-vc-parallax="1.5">

           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row vc_custom_1606680963884">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-8">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;">
                 Course content
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The Master of Textile Engineering is a two-year master’s programme in the field of textile engineering. The programme was developed in the framework of and with full support of the Erasmus programme of the European Union. It was and still is a unique programme offering advanced education in Textile Engineering in which the latest developments in the textile field as well as contemporary teaching methods are incorporated. The most renowned specialists in the multidisciplinary domain of textiles in Europe and beyond are brought together. The programme benefits from significant industry participation. Graduates have acquired knowledge, skills and attitudes that ensure their impact on technological innovation, creativity, quality and management in industry as well as in academia.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;">
                 Course structure
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The programme of the Master of Textile Engineering is a full-time programme, organised at different locations, lectured in English. All major universities in Europe and worldwide offering a textile degree participate in the programme. As such, the programme benefits from the strengths of all participating universities, allowing to cover all modern areas related to textiles.
                 <br/>
                 The first three semesters are organised at a different host university.
                 <br/>
                 The fourth and last semester is dedicated to the dissertation at one of the participating universities (to be chosen by the student) under supervision of a tutor, possibly in co-operation with the industry.
                 <br/>
                 Students who are admitted spend one year and a half (three semesters) in three geographically spread regions in Europe where they are taught by a large number of professors of the participating universities as well as from industry. Each lecturer passes on his or her specific knowledge in a course module covering one or two weeks.
                 <br/>
                 Next to the traditional lecturing methods, active methods are used such as blended learning, case studies, projects, practical work in laboratories etc. To link theory with practice, industry is actively involved.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

					el = document.getElementById(e.c+"_wrapper");
					if (el!==null && el) {
						el.style.height = newh+"px";
						el.style.display = "block";
					}
				} catch(e){
					console.log("Failure at Presize of Slider:" + e)
				}
			//});
		  };
  </script>

						var m = pw>(e.gw[ix]+e.tabw+e.thumbw) ? 1 : (pw-(e.tabw+e.thumbw)) / (e.gw[ix]);
						newh =  (e.gh[ix] * m) + (e.tabh + e.thumbh);
					}
					var el = document.getElementById(e.c);
					if (el!==null && el) el.style.height = newh+"px";
					el = document.getElementById(e.c+"_wrapper");
					if (el!==null && el) {
						el.style.height = newh+"px";
						el.style.display = "block";
					}
				} catch(e){
					console.log("Failure at Presize of Slider:" + e)
				}
			//});
		  };
  </script>

                <p>

                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 Each semester has two blocks of five weeks courses and two weeks of exams. Each course lasts one week and is given by another specialised professor from one of the
                 <a href="https://www.autex.org/members" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  AUTEX members
                 </a>
                 .
                </p>

    <!-- main -->

     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-3022 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Career Perspectives
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2024-07-21T20:28:57+02:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row row-align-items-center porto-inner-container" data-vc-full-width="true" data-vc-full-width-init="false">
            <div class="porto-wrap-container container">
             <div class="row">
              <div class="pr-lg-5 mb-sm-5 mb-lg-0 vc_column_container col-md-12 col-lg-6">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="color:#1d2127;">
                   Building your career skills
                   <br/>
                   with WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <style>
                  .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
                 </style>
                </div>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The degree master of textile engineering can lead to different careers involving textile knowledge in the broadest sense of the word. Students obtain a thorough understanding of all aspects related to textiles and are hence well-prepared for jobs requiring elaborate knowledge in textiles. Graduates go for a career in academia and industry.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   The jobs imply technical functions, R&D functions and (general) management functions mainly in three types of sectors:
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   • the textile and clothing industry
                   <br/>
                   • sectors that supply textile companies with raw materials, chemical products and machines
                   <br/>
                   • end users such as transportation (cars, planes, trains), medical products, furniture and many more.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Employment has an explicit international dimension thanks to the international and global character of the programme itself.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="col-sm-8 offset-sm-5 mt-sm-5 pt-sm-5 vc_column_container col-md-6 offset-lg-2 col-lg-4 offset-md-4">

    <!-- main -->

     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-2544 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          AUTEX and E-TEAM
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2024-07-19T11:24:05+02:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 About AUTEX and E-TEAM
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 <a href="https://www.autex.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  <strong>
                   AUTEX
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 stands for the
                 <strong>
                  Association of Universities for Textiles
                 </strong>
                 and is a worldwide network of textile universities. It was founded in 1994. Over the years a strong enlargement took place and the Association currently has 47 members from 33 countries, covering Europe, Asia, Australia and the USA.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The mission of
                 <a href="https://www.autex.org/about" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  AUTEX
                 </a>
                 is to facilitate co-operation amongst its members in high level textile education and research. It’s motto is
                 <strong>
                  stronger together
                 </strong>
                 .
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-users text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <h4>
                    <span style="color: #0069b4;">
                     47 members
                    </span>
                   </h4>
                   <p>
                    AUTEX facilitates co-operation amongst its members
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-globe-americas text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <h4>
                    <span style="color: #0069b4;">
                     33 Countries
                    </span>
                   </h4>
                   <p>
                    From Europe, Africa, America, Asia and Australia
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-history text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <h4>
                    <span style="color: #0069b4;">
                     30+ years
                    </span>
                   </h4>
                   <p>
                    Founded in 1994, AUTEX has
                    <br/>
                    a long history
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-3">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 35px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-content-box featured-boxes wpb_content_element featured-boxes-style-3">
               <div class="featured-box featured-box-primary featured-box-effect-3">
                <div class="box-content" style="">
                 <i class="icon-featured fas fa-user-graduate text-color-primary border-color-primary">
                 </i>
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <h4>
                    <span style="color: #0069b4;">
                     Current chair
                    </span>
                   </h4>
                   <p>
                    Prof. Dr. Savvas Vassiliadis from University of West Attica, Greece
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The current chair is Prof. Dr. Savvas Vassiliadis from University of West Attica, Greece.
                </p>
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  E-Team
                 </strong>
                 (
                 <strong>
                  European Textile Engineering Advanced Master
                 </strong>
                 ) has started almost 20 years ago as the joint master of
                 <a href="https://www.autex.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  AUTEX
                 </a>
                 . It has now obtained a global character and becomes WE-TEAM from the academic year 2021-2022 onwards. The programme is still unique in its concept. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education:
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  each of the 3 semesters are organised in a different location, the 4
                  <sup>
                   th
                  </sup>
                  semester students can carry out their master thesis at one of the
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org/members" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX members
                  </a>
                  , depending on their personal interest
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  each course is taught full time during one week
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  the lecturers are recruited from the pool of more than 200 qualified
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org/members-quick-list" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX professors
                  </a>
                  .
                 </li>
                </ul>
                <p>
                 Bringing together the best students, offering them the best
                 <a href="https://www.autex.org/members-quick-list" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  AUTEX professors
                 </a>
                 in each field and giving them a multiple international experience adds to their education and personal development.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-4" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">

                </div>

            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-4" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp" data-appear-animation-delay="600">

   <div class="column1 boxed" id="main">
    <!-- main -->
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-2563 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          How to apply
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2024-10-14T15:48:44+02:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 The application procedure in 5 steps
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p class="m_-8713230873801408603MsoListParagraph">
                <span lang="EN-US">
                 For the Edition 2025-2027 partial waivers of the tuition fee will be awarded to the best students, thus no scholarships.
                </span>
                <u>
                </u>
                <u>
                </u>
                <span lang="EN-US">
                 If the WE-TEAM project is funded by the EU, EMJM scholarships will be available from the Edition 2026-2028 onward.
                </span>
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 First you need to create a WE-TEAM account. Next you enter all required data in the Application Form*. The steps and links are described below:
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <ol class="list list-ordened list-ordened-style-3">
                 <li>
                  Determine whether you are eligible for the WE-TEAM programme by checking carefully the
                  <a href="https://we-team.education/academic-requirements/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                   Admission requirements
                  </a>
                  page.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Before you begin make sure you have the following information ready:
                  <br/>
                  <strong>
                   <br/>
                   i) For non-EU students
                  </strong>
                  :
                  <br/>
                  – the e-mail address of the embassy where you will apply for your visa. You will have to fill this out in the form
                  <br/>
                  <strong>
                   <br/>
                   ii) For all students
                  </strong>
                  :
                  <br/>
                  – Bachelor diploma (or Certificate of Enrolment if you are still in your last year)
                  <br/>
                  – Transcript of Records
                  <br/>
                  – Pdf of your passport
                  <br/>
                  – Your picture
                  <br/>
                  – Short CV in
                  <a href="https://europa.eu/europass/en/create-europass-cv" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   Europass format
                  </a>
                  <br/>
                  – Proof of place of residence
                  <br/>
                  – English Language Certificate
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  When applications are open, create an UGent OASIS account by clicking the “Click for account setup” button. After registration you can fill out the enrolment application form (General Information – Enrolment – Apply as a degree student).
                  <br/>
                  <em>
                   Note: there is one single Application Form for both admission to the programme and the scholarship application.
                  </em>
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Fill in the online Application Form and submit it prior to the set
                  <a href="https://we-team.education/application-timetable/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                   deadlines
                  </a>
                  .
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  In case your file has been evaluated as positive by the Selection Committee, you will be invited for an on-line interview, which is the last phase in the Application Procedure.
                 </li>
                </ol>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 * There is one single Application Form for both
                 <u>
                  admission to the programme
                 </u>
                 and
                 <u>
                  a waiver
                 </u>
                 , via the OASIS online platform.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </div>
      </div>

        <article class="post-3865 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Apply now
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2025-02-19T11:19:23+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 Page for your application
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 If you need to find out how to apply, please visit first the “
                 <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  How to apply
                 </a>
                 ” page, which explains in details the procedure in 5 steps.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_btn3-container vc_btn3-center">
               <a class="vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-xl vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-classic vc_btn3-block wpb_custom_6687b26f39488ddbb85ddb3c1ce8e111 vc_btn3-icon-left hover-icon-zoom vc_btn3-color-juicy-pink btn" href="https://oasis.ugent.be/oasis-web/registratie?target=inschrijven&arCode=EMITEX&aj=2022" target="_blank" title="This is the link to the registration/application">
                <i class="vc_btn3-icon fas fa-edit">
                </i>
                Click for account setup
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 10px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">

   <div class="column1 boxed" id="main">
    <!-- main -->
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-2531 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Requirements
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2024-11-21T17:37:41+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 Academic Requirements
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 Applicants should hold a Bachelor degree:
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <style>
               .porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 i { color: #212529;font-size: 24px; }
              </style>
              <ul class="porto-info-list porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 wpb_custom_e5badd2f025eaa2cb3c7820aa1780c86">
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 in Engineering or Science
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 min 180 ECTS/3 years or equivalent
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 min 15 ECTS in maths, min 10 ECTS in chemistry and physics or equivalent
                 <br/>
                 (for Japanese University graduates: min 10 credits in maths, min 5 credits in chemistry and min 5 credits in physics)
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 from a recognised university
                </div>
               </li>
              </ul>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                <em>
                 Note:
                </em>
                Students in their last year of such a study programme at the time of application will also be considered for admission. It is the applicant’s responsibility that the required degree is obtained prior to the start of the WE-TEAM programme.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                All students participating in the WE-TEAM programme will need to sign the
                <a href="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/WE-TEAM_Student_Agreement_Template-2021-2023.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                 <b>
                  Student Agreement
                 </b>
                </a>
                prior to the start of the programme.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-separator">
               <hr class="separator-line align_center" style="background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, transparent, grey, transparent); background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, grey, transparent);"/>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 English Language Requirements
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The WE-TEAM programme is taught in English thus an English language proficiency is a basic requirement. One of the following certificates that are not older than 5 years from the start of the programme (September) must be submitted:
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                The Application tool will give a dropdown list with more options, however, take into account that only the certificates mentioned here are accepted!
               </p>
              </div>
              <style>
               .porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 i { color: #212529;font-size: 24px; }
              </style>
              <ul class="porto-info-list porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 wpb_custom_e5badd2f025eaa2cb3c7820aa1780c86">
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  B2 Cambridge Certificate
                 </strong>
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  IELTS Certificate
                 </strong>
                 with a minimum overall score of 6.5 with at least 6 for writing
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  TOEFL Certificate
                 </strong>
                 with a minimum score of 570 (paper) or 86 (internet)
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  TOEIC Certificate
                 </strong>
                 with a minimum score of 1560 calculated as (Listening&Reading score + Writing&Speaking score multiplied by 2.5)
                </div>
               </li>
              </ul>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                <em>
                 Exemptions:
                </em>
                if you have acquired at least 60 ECTS (a fulltime academic year) in an English based instruction programme, you can provide a stamped and signed Certificate of English proficiency issued by your home university.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </div>

       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-2541 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Checklist of documents
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2023-01-18T19:53:44+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 You will need to submit the following documents, so start well in advance to collect them:
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <style>
               .porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 i { color: #212529;font-size: 24px; }
              </style>
              <ul class="porto-info-list porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 wpb_custom_e5badd2f025eaa2cb3c7820aa1780c86">
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Passport photo
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Copy of your passport (or other official identification proof for EEA students)
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 “Europass” CV
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Motivation letter (may be as submitted in your Application Form)
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Legalized copy of your Higher Education (Bachelor/Master) Degree: original + certified English translation
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Legalized copy of your Higher Education (Bachelor/Master) Transcript of Records: original + certified English translation
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 English Language Certificate
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 Other documentation you deem relevant
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 You will be asked to insert a link to a video in which you present a scientific topic, if possible related to textiles but not required. This video should not last longer than 5 minutes. Your video can be shared in Google Drive, Dropbox, YouTube etc.
                </div>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-separator">
               <hr class="separator-line align_center" style="background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, transparent, grey, transparent); background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, grey, transparent);"/>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 Legalisation of Documents
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 <strong>
                  This can be a very long and time-consuming process, please start it well in advance!
                 </strong>
                </p>
                <p>
                 In order to ascertain the authenticity of your Diploma and Transcript of Records, we need to receive duly legalized copies of these documents. Please carefully read the information
                 <a href="https://www.ugent.be/prospect/en/administration/application/application-degree/legalisation.htm" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  on the Ghent University website
                 </a>
                 about the legalization methods per country and how to get your documents correctly legalized.
                </p>
                <p>
                 The legalisation method depends on the country where the diploma was issued (
                 <a href="https://www.ugent.be/prospect/en/administration/application/application-degree/listcountries.pdf" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  check the list of countries per legalisation method on the Ghent University website
                 </a>
                 ):
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <style>
               .porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 i { color: #212529;font-size: 24px; }
              </style>
              <ul class="porto-info-list porto-info-list606030ee9745a0144729b7b399785922 wpb_custom_e5badd2f025eaa2cb3c7820aa1780c86">
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  Apostille:
                 </strong>
                 your country has signed the
                 <a href="https://www.hcch.net/en/instruments/conventions/full-text/?cid=41" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  Hague Treaty
                 </a>
                 , you are therefore required to submit an official copy with original Apostille seal. More information can be found on
                 <a href="https://www.hcch.net/en/states/authorities" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  www.hcch.net
                 </a>
                 .
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  Belgian Embassy:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="https://diplomatie.belgium.be/en/services/legalisation_of_documents" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  Foreign Affairs: legalisation
                 </a>
                 .
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="porto-info-list-item wpb_custom_eade0171093a7591372ccf9372738e3d">
                <i class="porto-info-icon fas fa-caret-right">
                </i>
                <div class="porto-info-list-item-desc">
                 <strong>
                  Certified Copy:
                 </strong>
                 The country where your diploma was issued has a special agreement with Belgium and you are therefore required to submit a copy taken of the original primary document by a qualified official who guarantees its authenticity as a true copy. More information about certified copies can be found on the
                 <a href="https://www.ugent.be/student/en/administration/diploma/truecopy.htm" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                  Ghent University website
                 </a>
                 .
                </div>
               </li>
              </ul>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                <em>
                 Note:
                </em>
                you might have to contact the institute that issued your diploma to obtain a certified copy or to find out what the procedure is to have your diploma apostilled or legalized.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                <em>
                 Note:
                </em>
                if your higher education diploma is not issued in English, it needs to be translated by a certified translator and the original plus the translation need to be added to your application.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                <em>
                 Note:
                </em>
                students with a Chinese degree should be aware of the APS screening.
                <a href="https://www.ugent.be/chinaplatform/en/aps/overview.htm" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                 More info on the Ghent University website
                </a>
                .
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </div>

   <div class="column1 boxed" id="main">
    <!-- main -->
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row main-content-wrap">
      <!-- main content -->
      <div class="main-content col-lg-12">
       <div id="content" role="main">
        <article class="post-3406 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Appeal Procedure
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2021-04-15T18:08:14+02:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The WE-TEAM Coordination Office is responsible, on behalf of the WE-TEAM Management Board, to inform the applicants about the outcome of the selection phase, by the end the of April for scholarship and self-funded non-EU applicants, and by the beginning of July for self-funded EU applicants.
                </p>
                <p>
                 At the end of each selection phase, applicants have the possibility to file an appeal.
                </p>
                <p>
                 An appeal can only relate
                 <u>
                  to the correct completion of the evaluation procedure
                 </u>
                 ,
                 <u>
                  not to the outcome thereof
                 </u>
                 . The appeal must be received within 10 working days from the notification date of the selection results. The notification date is the date on which the WE-TEAM Coordination Office sends the notification e-mail.
                </p>
                <p>
                 In case of an appeal, the
                 <a href="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/WE-TEAM-Appeal-Form.docx" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  <strong>
                   WE-TEAM Appeal Form
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 needs to be filled out, signed, dated and sent by e-mail to
                 <a href="mailto:we-team@ugent.be">
                  we-team@ugent.be
                 </a>
                 .
                </p>
                <p>
                 The sender will receive an acknowledgement of receipt by email. The appeal will then be investigated by the WE-TEAM Management Board. The appellant will receive the outcome of the appeal by e-mail from the WE-TEAM Coordination Office within 21 working days after the date on which the appellant sent his/her appeal form by e-mail to WE-TEAM.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-6">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_btn3-container vc_btn3-center">
               <a class="vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-xl vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-classic vc_btn3-block wpb_custom_6687b26f39488ddbb85ddb3c1ce8e111 vc_btn3-icon-left vc_btn3-color-orange btn" href="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/WE-TEAM-Appeal-Form.docx" target="_blank" title="">
                <i class="vc_btn3-icon fas fa-file-download">
                </i>
                Click to download the WE-TEAM Appeal Form
               </a>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-6">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">

         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">

         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">

         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">

               <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle">
                </i>
               </div>
               <p>
                For the Edition 2025-2027 partial waivers of the tuition fee will be awarded to the best students, thus no scholarships. If the WE-TEAM project is funded by the EU, EMJM scholarships will be available from the Edition 2026-2028 onward.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 Contribution to the
                 <strong>
                  participation costs (until Edition 2024-2026)
                 </strong>
                 :
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li class="m_6033845578210197737MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst">
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  Up to €9.000 per year per scholarship holder from a Partner Country
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  <u>
                  </u>
                 </li>
                 <li class="m_6033845578210197737MsoListParagraphCxSpLast">
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  Up to €4.500 per year per scholarship holder from a Programme Country
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-separator">
               <hr class="separator-line align_center" style="background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, transparent, grey, transparent); background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, grey, transparent);"/>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 Contribution to
                 <b>
                  travel and installation costs (until Edition 2024-2026)
                 </b>
                 :
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li class="m_6033845578210197737MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst">
                  €1.000 per year per scholarship holder resident in a Programme Country for travel costs
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  <u>
                  </u>
                 </li>
                 <li class="m_6033845578210197737MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle">
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  €2.000 per year for travel costs + €1.000 for installation costs for a scholarship holder, resident in a Partner Country less than 4.000km from the EMJMD coordinating HEI
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  <u>
                  </u>
                 </li>
                 <li class="m_6033845578210197737MsoListParagraphCxSpLast">
                  <u>
                  </u>
                  €3.000 per year for travel costs + €1.000 for installation costs for a scholarship holder, resident in a Partner Country 4.000km or more from the EMJMD coordinating HEI
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-separator">
               <hr class="separator-line align_center" style="background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, transparent, grey, transparent); background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, grey, transparent);"/>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 <b>
                  Self-funded students
                 </b>
                 :
                </p>
                <p>
                 Self-funded students are students that do not receive an Erasmus Mundus Scholarship, but do enroll in the programme by funding their studies through personal funds, alternative scholarships, or other sources of support.
                </p>
                <p>
                 When applying for a visa, they will have to prove sufficient means of subsistence. There are several ways to do this, of which the Blocked Account is used most frequently. All information about how to proceed, can be found on the UGent website.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </article>
       </div>
