        <article class="post-2527 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Testimonials
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2022-02-25T08:15:56+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 What students say (while the Master programme was limited in Europe)
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  This programme has contributed me a lot in terms of personel skills, relationships and leadership. I do hope the programme will continue to grow and give graduates each year.
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Müge Atagun" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="60" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Muge_Atagun_60_60.jpg" width="60"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Müge Atagun
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   Country Manager of Etam Grouppe in Turkey and the Middle East region
                   <i>
                    (graduated 2004)
                   </i>
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  The E-TEAM programme has had an important positive impact on the course of my life, both professionally and privately. The cooperation between universities, combined with the modular teaching method allows to intensively focus on a broad range of subjects taught by the best professors in their respective fields. Furthermore, the international experience and network resulting from attending the programme is highly valued by future employers. The programme has helped me to build a rewarding and strongly international oriented career.
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Bram Van Genabet" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="60" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Bram_Van_Genabet_60_60.jpg" width="60"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Bram Van Genabet
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   Corporate digital manager at Barry Callebaut (2015-today)Freelance consultant at Hinicio (2015-today)Advanced process control consultant at IPCOS (2014-2015)Process and application engineer at ExxonMobil (2010-2014)
                   <i>
                    (Belgium, graduated in 2010)
                   </i>
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  I’ve completed my E-TEAM master in the Summer of 2014, and it has equipped me with valuable knowledge and the skills to start my PhD directly after. Looking back, it has been a fantastic experience to travel around Europe to visit different Universities. We were exposed to many different insights into research areas presented by different, internationally renowned Professors, this is invaluable and unique to this course. I have met incredible people along the way and this has been a great experience, both professionally and personally.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  The strength of the programme is the variety of topics, teaching styles, and backgrounds of professors and it truly give a broad perspective of the textile world. I have thoroughly enjoyed my E-TEAM time and more often than not, it has intrigued interviewers during job interviews that I have been on a unique course.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  I have chosen not to stay in academia but instead pursue a career in industry, should there nevertheless be an interest in a guest lecture (e.g. for the composites course I’d be happy to do so for the E-TEAM.
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Laura Veldenz" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="60" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Laura_Veldenz_60_60.jpg" width="60"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Laura Veldenz
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   PhD in composites, university of Bristol (UK)Sales engineer at SGL CarbonProposal engineer at Airborne (The Hague, NL)
                   <i>
                    (graduated 2014)
                   </i>
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  For me, it was the first time stepping out of my comfort zone and also the first time traveling abroad for a very long duration. The initial homesickness is inevitable but it soon ebbed with the support from my classmates. I joined the programme a week later after it commenced. My friends helped me to cope up with lost time. With progressing semesters, my course allowed me the mobility to study at 3 different countries. We moved as a class which played a huge part in gelling us together. Over the semesters, our coordination improved as a result.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  E-TEAM is a perfect option for the student who has passion for travelling and advancing in the textile industry. Overall, the programme was an enlightening experience and one that is so hard to forget.
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Lakshmi Palaniappan" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/no-avatar-150x150.png" width="150"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Lakshmi Palaniappan
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   (India, graduated in 2016)
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  The E-TEAM project was very helpful for me. During four semesters, I studied in three different universities. This exchange experience directly helped me to find a suitable PhD project, because my PhD tutor also gave us lectures during the E-TEAM project. In addition to this, I learned lots of professional lectures from this project that expanded my understanding about textiles. I think I found my favorite interest in textile engineering and laid a foundation for my next choice.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  In addition to the impact on learning, this project also helped me to learn a lot of skills in life. It helped me to improve my ability to speak English and gave me the chance to communicate with many foreign students. It also gave me the chance to live in three places and to learn about the lives of the local people.
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Dan Wang" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="150" loading="lazy" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/no-avatar-150x150.png" width="150"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Dan Wang
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   (China, graduated in 2018)
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  E-TEAM is a best decision that I would had taken for my Master studies. The programme is unique in all its ways, starting with travelling each semester to different country, ending with variety of modules that we have gotten each weak. Every semester I was one big step up in “building my hill of experience”. I had the opportunity to meet best people, to see beautiful places around the Europe and to have best 2 years of my life!
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Rovena Vaičkutė" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="60" loading="lazy" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Rovena_Vaickute_60_60.jpg" width="60"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Rovena Vaičkutė
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   (Lithuania, MSc2 student)
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  Looking back, I can say that joining the programme is one of the excellent decisions I made. I gained in-depth knowledge in advanced materials and processes , smart textiles, emerging technologies in the field of material and textiles among others. The courses are organized in modules and most of the courses had team assignments which made us work in groups. The programme was intense and demanding as we were doing one module per week. Working on the courses assignments in itself created a special relationship amongst us classmates as we could regularly spend time together after class hours as we work on our assignments and by default plan our extra curriculum activities together. Through this arrangements, I got to know my classmates’ origins better and the existing cultural differences amongst us. I believe they learnt a lot from me as well. We pre-explored the places we were going to for the semester together, as most of us were new in this locations. We learnt how to find our way out in these environments. I must say that our hosts in these institutions did a great job, as they ensured we had buddies to integrate us into their systems by taking us to social events like get togethers evenings and weekends. They could also advise, or in the first weeks give us company as they show us places like cheap students restaurants, shopping, laundry, cinema e.tc.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  During a few weekends that we were free, we could join a few of the Erasmus trips to explore different places around our locations. For example while in Maribor, we visited Graz and Vienna. While in Mulhouse we visited Strasbourg and Basel.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  To summarize it all, the experience through this programme taught me new things academically, socially, internationally and exposed me to different environments all over Europe. I Learnt the way of doing things while in France, Slovenia, Turkey and in Belgium. As soon as I completed my Masters degree which I passed with a greatest distinction, I started with my PhD in UGent (Belgium).
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">
                  <img alt="Sheilla Odhiambo" class="img-circle" decoding="async" height="60" loading="lazy" src="https://we-team.education/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Sheill_Odhiambo_60_60.jpg" width="60"/>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <strong>
                   Sheilla Odhiambo
                  </strong>
                  <span>
                   PhD at UGhentLecturer at Moi University (Kenya)Visiting lecturer at University College Ghent
                   <i>
                    (Kenya, graduated 2011)
                   </i>
                  </span>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-testimonial wpb_content_element wpb_custom_4760b66c0cbf51ec9a7673f3785bca75">
               <div class="testimonial">
                <blockquote>
                 <p>
                  I appreciate participating in E-TEAM because it led me to learn the newest and the most updated technologies and sciences available in Textile Engineering. Also, the Textile world has a wide variety of areas and E-TEAM covers all of them, giving the students a really good view and understanding of the whole textile industry. This leads them to have courage and self-confidence to speak their opinion and when it comes to solving a problem, they dare to think and invent a solution.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Another thing was sitting in one class with international students and professors. This way you get an idea about other countries’ university systems and the textile industry. You will be able to express yourself and communicate in English. This leads to a better understanding of other people and accepting and respecting the fact that everyone is different and unique. You will get a more realistic view when you compare your home country with others and you get to know other countries’ problems and advantages. You will get more independent and learn to survive and manage your life far from home, without the help of others. You’ll become more dependent and more open-minded. Also, some projects need to be done in groups with other students and some of them have a presentation. So you improve your group work, sense of responsibility and public speaking. The process of moving each semester is interesting. As you mentioned yourself the first day, moving will be easier after 3-4 times so you get to be more flexible and more adaptive to change. This way you can embrace every opportunity because you are not afraid to change your place. E-TEAM enables all students, even the ones from developing countries like me, to be in touch with the world and sit in the lectures of great international professors in this field, and also travel and get to know the world better while studying and getting more knowledgeable at the same time. I am very grateful that I had the chance to be in E-TEAM!
                 </p>
                </blockquote>
                <div class="testimonial-arrow-down">
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-author">
                 <div class="testimonial-author-thumbnail">

        <div class="page-faqs clearfix porto-ajax-load load-infinite" data-post_type="faq">

          <div class="faq post-3745 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             01. How do I apply for the WE-TEAM program?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              01. How do I apply for the WE-TEAM program?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:05+02:00
             </span>
             To apply, visit our application page and follow the application guidelines provided. Ensure you meet the eligibility criteria and submit all required documents by the deadline.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3746 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             02. What documents are required for the WE-TEAM program?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              02. What documents are required for the WE-TEAM program?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:45+02:00
             </span>
             For documents you can visit our requirements section, required documents typically include Bachelor diploma (or Certificate of Enrolment if you are still in your last year) , transcript of records , pdf of your passport, your picture,  short CV in Europass format, proof of place of residence , English language certificate. Check the application guidelines for a comprehensive list.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3747 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             03. Is there an application fee to apply WE-TEAM program?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              03. Is there an application fee to apply WE-TEAM program?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:15+02:00
             </span>
             No, there is no fee to apply to this program.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3748 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             04. What is the application deadline for the WE-TEAM program?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              04. What is the application deadline for the WE-TEAM program?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:32+02:00
             </span>
             Application deadlines vary every year. Refer to the Application timetable  or contact  the admissions office for specific deadlines.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3749 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             05. Can I update my application after submission?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              05. Can I update my application after submission?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:23+02:00
             </span>
             No, after submission, you are not able to change your application.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3750 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             06. How are letters of recommendation submitted for the WE-TEAM application?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              06. How are letters of recommendation submitted for the WE-TEAM application?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:44:59+02:00
             </span>
             Letters of recommendation are typically submitted directly by the recommenders through the online application portal.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3751 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             07. Can I apply for the WE-TEAM program if my bachelor’s degree is still in progress?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              07. Can I apply for the WE-TEAM program if my bachelor’s degree is still in progress?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:43:30+02:00
             </span>
             Yes, students in their last year of such a study programme at the time of application will also be considered for admission. It is the applicant’s responsibility that the required degree is obtained prior to the start of the WE-TEAM programme.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3752 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             08. How can I track the status of my application?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              08. How can I track the status of my application?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-07-17T17:43:36+02:00
             </span>
             You can check your application status on oasis. Once the management committee makes a decision, you'll get an email notification.
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3753 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             09. Do I need to apply for the Erasmus Mundus scholarship separately?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              09. Do I need to apply for the Erasmus Mundus scholarship separately?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-10-25T10:54:43+02:00
             </span>
             <p>
              <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
               <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
                <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    There is one single Application Form for both admission to the programme and a scholarship, via the OASIS online platform.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
                  <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                   <i class="fas fa-info-circle">
                   </i>
                  </div>
                  <p>
                   Note that there are no Erasmus Mundus scholarships available for the Edition 2025-2027.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </p>
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>
          <div class="faq post-3754 type-faq status-publish hentry">
           <section class="toggle">
            <label>
             10. Is an interview a part of the Erasmus Mundus application process?
            </label>
            <div class="toggle-content">
             <h3 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
              10. Is an interview a part of the Erasmus Mundus application process?
             </h3>
             <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
              <span class="fn">
               <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
                Aris Repoulias
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
             <span class="updated" style="display:none">
              2024-10-25T10:55:57+02:00
             </span>
             <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
              <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Yes, an interview is a crucial component in the Erasmus Mundus application process and is considered in assessing eligibility
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-warning vc_do_message">
                 <div class="vc_message_box-icon">
                  <i class="fas fa-info-circle">
                  </i>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  Note that there are no Erasmus Mundus scholarships available for the Edition 2025-2027.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </section>
          </div>

         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">

         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">

         <div class="page-content">

           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row p-t-xxl row-align-items-center section section-default mt-0 mb-0 section-no-borders porto-inner-container" data-vc-full-width="true" data-vc-full-width-init="false">

               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/academic-requirements/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best
                   <a href="https://www.autex.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                    AUTEX
                   </a>
                   professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>

           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row vc_custom_1606680935477">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                 Building your career skills with WE-TEAM
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 WE-TEAM has initially started almost 20 years ago under the name of E-TEAM. The programme is still unique in its concept. It offers students an exceptional level of
                 <strong>
                  mobility
                 </strong>
                 and
                 <strong>
                  high quality education
                 </strong>
                 :
                </p>
                <ul>
                 <li>
                  Each of the 3 semesters are organised in a different location, the 4th semester students can carry out their master thesis at one of the
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org/members" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX members
                  </a>
                  , depending on their personal interest.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Each course is taught full time during one week.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The lecturers are recruited from the pool of more than 200 qualified
                  <a href="https://www.autex.org" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                   AUTEX
                  </a>
                  professors.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  No single university can offer the same level of expertise in all areas of textiles, nor the same international experience.
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  The degrees awarded within the WE-TEAM programme have the required accreditations according to the European standards.
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>

           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row vc_custom_1606680963884">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-8">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;">
                 Course content
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The Master of Textile Engineering is a two-year master’s programme in the field of textile engineering. The programme was developed in the framework of and with full support of the Erasmus programme of the European Union. It was and still is a unique programme offering advanced education in Textile Engineering in which the latest developments in the textile field as well as contemporary teaching methods are incorporated. The most renowned specialists in the multidisciplinary domain of textiles in Europe and beyond are brought together. The programme benefits from significant industry participation. Graduates have acquired knowledge, skills and attitudes that ensure their impact on technological innovation, creativity, quality and management in industry as well as in academia.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp">
               <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                <h2 style="color:#1d2127;">
                 Course structure
                </h2>
               </div>
               <style>
                .porto-u-ad87e2eaf3f9c495180fe0156ddf3eb0.porto-u-heading{text-align:left}
               </style>
              </div>
              <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <p>
                 The programme of the Master of Textile Engineering is a full-time programme, organised at different locations, lectured in English. All major universities in Europe and worldwide offering a textile degree participate in the programme. As such, the programme benefits from the strengths of all participating universities, allowing to cover all modern areas related to textiles.
                 <br/>
                 The first three semesters are organised at a different host university.
                 <br/>
                 The fourth and last semester is dedicated to the dissertation at one of the participating universities (to be chosen by the student) under supervision of a tutor, possibly in co-operation with the industry.
                 <br/>
                 Students who are admitted spend one year and a half (three semesters) in three geographically spread regions in Europe where they are taught by a large number of professors of the participating universities as well as from industry. Each lecturer passes on his or her specific knowledge in a course module covering one or two weeks.
                 <br/>
                 Next to the traditional lecturing methods, active methods are used such as blended learning, case studies, projects, practical work in laboratories etc. To link theory with practice, industry is actively involved.
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>

         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">

         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">

                <div class="porto-u-heading mb-0 wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp" data-appear-animation-delay="1000">
                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.
                  <p>
                   <a class="btn btn-outline btn-outline-primary font-weight-semibold text-uppercase text-sm custom-btn-style-1" href="/about-we-team">
                    Read More
                   </a>
                  </p>
                 </div>
                 <style>

                 </style>

                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Structure of the studies
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <style>

                 <div class="tab-content">

                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MATERIALS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. This is dedicated to the study of materials.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1433487371986-0-9">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MANUFACTURING
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The second semester for the edition 2023-2025 takes place in Université Haute-Alsace, France. It is dedicated to the study of manufacturing processes.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300053686-2-7">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       APPLICATIONS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. The studies of this semester are dedicated to applications.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300079974-3-5">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       THESIS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The fourth semester is dedicated to the preparation and presentation of the thesis. The place where it may take place is decided upon choice, at a full partner or associate partner.
                     </p>

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>

                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>

                <div class="porto-u-heading mb-0 wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp" data-appear-animation-delay="1000">
                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.
                  <p>
                   <a class="btn btn-outline btn-outline-primary font-weight-semibold text-uppercase text-sm custom-btn-style-1" href="/about-we-team">
                    Read More
                   </a>
                  </p>
                 </div>

               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>

                    <br/>
                    CRDT:
                    <strong>
                     3
                    </strong>
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
               <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
                <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                 <div class="porto-separator">
                  <hr class="separator-line align_center solid" style="background-color:#dbdbdb;"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
               <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
                <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p>
                    The aim of this course unit is to educate the students on the main aspects of fibre material colouration. A first part is dedicated to how colour can be quantified. A  second part is dedicated to the thermodynamics and the kinetics of dyeing processes. A third part applies this knowledge to the most important textile materials including examples of novel applications. Finally, dyeing and printing equipment is discussed.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>

        <article class="post-5 page type-page status-publish hentry">
         <h2 class="entry-title" style="display: none;">
          Home
         </h2>
         <span class="vcard" style="display: none;">
          <span class="fn">
           <a href="https://we-team.education/author/aris-rep/" rel="author" title="Posts by Aris Repoulias">
            Aris Repoulias
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="updated" style="display:none">
          2025-02-19T11:20:21+01:00
         </span>
         <div class="page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row vc_custom_1527816640448 section section-default mt-0 section-no-borders vc_row-has-fill porto-inner-container">
            <div class="porto-wrap-container container">
             <div class="row">
              <div class="vc_column_container col-md-10 offset-md-1">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <div class="porto-u-heading mb-0 wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp" data-appear-animation-delay="1000">
                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.
                  <p>
                   <a class="btn btn-outline btn-outline-primary font-weight-semibold text-uppercase text-sm custom-btn-style-1" href="/about-we-team">
                    Read More
                   </a>
                  </p>
                 </div>
                 <style>
                  .porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac.porto-u-heading{text-align:center}
                 </style>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row row top-row">
            <div class="vc_column_container col-md-12">
             <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
              <div class="vc_empty_space" style="height: 22px">
               <span class="vc_empty_space_inner">
               </span>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="vc_row wpb_row top-row vc_custom_1606440317751 porto-inner-container" data-appear-animation="fadeInUp" data-appear-animation-delay="1000">
            <div class="porto-wrap-container container">
             <div class="row">
              <div class="vc_column_container col-md-8">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper vc_column-inner">
                <div class="porto-u-heading m-b-lg wpb_custom_95aa9a11c17ad45cfabaf210d84ee7cc porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac">
                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Structure of the studies
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <style>
                  .porto-u-55ca8359258f9a412be7e73af65d2aac.porto-u-heading{text-align:center}
                 </style>
                </div>
                <div class="tabs">
                 <ul class="nav nav-tabs nav-justified">
                  <li class="nav-item active">
                   <a class="nav-link" data-bs-toggle="tab" href="#tab-1433487371015-0-3" id="tab-1433487371015-0-3-title">
                    <i class="fas fa-book">
                    </i>
                    Semester 1
                   </a>
                  </li>
                  <li class="nav-item">
                   <a class="nav-link" data-bs-toggle="tab" href="#tab-1433487371986-0-9" id="tab-1433487371986-0-9-title">
                    <i class="fas fa-flask">
                    </i>
                    Semester 2
                   </a>
                  </li>
                  <li class="nav-item">
                   <a class="nav-link" data-bs-toggle="tab" href="#tab-1606300053686-2-7" id="tab-1606300053686-2-7-title">
                    <i class="fas fa-microchip">
                    </i>
                    Semester 3
                   </a>
                  </li>
                  <li class="nav-item">
                   <a class="nav-link" data-bs-toggle="tab" href="#tab-1606300079974-3-5" id="tab-1606300079974-3-5-title">
                    <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap">
                    </i>
                    Semester 4
                   </a>
                  </li>
                 </ul>
                 <div class="tab-content">
                  <div class="tab-pane active show fade" id="tab-1433487371015-0-3">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MATERIALS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. This is dedicated to the study of materials.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1433487371986-0-9">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MANUFACTURING
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The second semester for the edition 2023-2025 takes place in Université Haute-Alsace, France. It is dedicated to the study of manufacturing processes.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300053686-2-7">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       APPLICATIONS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. The studies of this semester are dedicated to applications.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300079974-3-5">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       THESIS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The fourth semester is dedicated to the preparation and presentation of the thesis. The place where it may take place is decided upon choice, at a full partner or associate partner.
                     </p>
                    </div>

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>

                 <div class="porto-u-main-heading">
                  <h2 style="font-weight:700;color:#1d2127;margin-bottom: 20px;">
                   Welcome to WE-TEAM
                  </h2>
                 </div>
                 <div class="porto-u-sub-heading" style="">
                  WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Programme to educate the next generation of textile engineers. Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. The second semester for the cohort 2024-2026 takes place in University of West Attica in Greece. For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. Professors from all over the world travel to these locations to teach you in their field of expertise during a one week course.
                  <p>
                   <a class="btn btn-outline btn-outline-primary font-weight-semibold text-uppercase text-sm custom-btn-style-1" href="/about-we-team">
                    Read More
                   </a>
                  </p>
                 </div>

                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MATERIALS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Students all start their first semester at Ghent University in Belgium. This is dedicated to the study of materials.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1433487371986-0-9">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       MANUFACTURING
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The second semester for the edition 2023-2025 takes place in Université Haute-Alsace, France. It is dedicated to the study of manufacturing processes.
                     </p>

                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab-1606300053686-2-7">

                     <p>

                       APPLICATIONS
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      For the third semester students have the option to go to the University of Boras in Sweden or to the Kyoto Institute of Technology in Japan. The studies of this semester are dedicated to applications.

                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 What is
                 <b>
                  WE-TEAM
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   WE-TEAM is a two year Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) Program to educate the next generation of textile engineers. It is a full-time programme lectured in English. It offers students an exceptional level of mobility and high quality education.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Who can
                 <b>
                  participate
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Students with a bachelor in Engineering or Science and that fulfil the requirements as listed in the
                   <a href="https://we-team.education/the-procedure-in-5-steps/" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    Admission Requirements
                   </a>
                   section can apply for the programme.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading mb-3 align-left" style="font-size: 25px;line-height: 1">
                 Why the
                 <b>
                  highest textile expertise
                 </b>
                 ?
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Education is offered by the best AUTEX professors in each field and has a distinct international character.
                  </p>
                 </div>
